dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Habitat and Ecology
dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: De Grave, S. & Klotz, W. 2013. Caridina simoni. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Habitat and Ecology
The species has been recorded from smaller streams, as well as bigger river systems. Additionally, it has been recorded from lakes and ponds.

Systems
  • Freshwater

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Conservation
dataObjects.title: IUCN Red List Assessment
dataObjects.rights: © International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.rightsHolder: International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: De Grave, S. & Klotz, W. 2013. Caridina simoni. In: IUCN 2014 . IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2014.1 . <www.iucnredlist.org>
dataObjects.description:
Red List Category
LC
Least Concern

Red List Criteria

Version
3.1

Year Assessed
2013

Assessor/s
De Grave, S. & Klotz, W.

Reviewer/s
Cumberlidge, N. & Smith, K.

Contributor/s

Justification
This species is known to occur across Sri Lanka (De Silva 1983), and has been extensively recorded across Tamil Nadu, India (as C. kunnathurensis). In view of this wide distribution and in the absence of any, known major threats, the species is considered to be of Least Concern.
